instructions.title: How To Delete Your Number One Music Account
instructions.before: There is only one way to Delete your Number one Music Account and that is by navigating through the actual website to the Contact us page.
instructions.after: Your account will be Deleted shortly after sending the Deletion request.

qnAnswers.question: How do I know my Account is really Deleted?
qnAnswers.answer: You can try and log back in.  When your account is deleted you will not be able to access your account. Please note that after deletion you won't be able to register again or re install your account even by using a different email.

steps: [Go to the Number One Music Website] (https://www.numberonemusic.com). If you're already logged in, doing so will open your Number One Music home page
Click the Username on the Top Right
Type a Message Requesting Deletion and Click Send
